name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ 城之崎ミア
summary:
ミアは萌え系コスプレが趣味の女の子。
いつもカレに写真を撮ってもらっては、
自身のブログで公開している彼女。
--
Mia is girl who enjoys MOE cosplay as a hobby. She always ask her boyfriend to take pictures of herself cosplaying, to publish it on her blog.
"Ehehe... Today's concept is THE JAPONISM!"
And, as is always this is also the boyfriend was trying to touch Mia posing for the shoot...

When you tap her, she swings and you will
hear sweet and sarrow chirping.
Whatever you would like to do by using Hand!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
info:
• 开发: FUTURE CREATE
  • 发行: FUTURE CREATE
  • 英文名: Tap de PuruMoe!! Mia
  • 平台: Android
  • 应用类型: アーケード＆アクション
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 售价: JP¥210
